title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Initial Login
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user taps on iOS At Bat for the first time
and is prompted with the paywall
and logs in with a single team entitled account

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will receive an Access Issue message

Title: Access Issue
Body: Your account does not have access to this feature. Select a purchase option or restore your purchases.
Action: Ok

Then the user will receive an Access Issue message

Title: Access Issue
Body: Your account does not have access to this feature. Select a purchase option or restore your purchases.
Action: Ok

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Continue as Lite
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is on the initial paywall
and logs in with single team entitled account
and taps on Continue As Lite

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the app as a Lite user
Then the user will be taken to the app as a Lite user

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Ads
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is in iOS At Bat
and is logged in with a single team entitled account
and taps on different At Bat tabs

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see ad banners
Then the user will see ad banners

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Gameday Audio
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with an single team entitled account
and is on the Scoreboard
and taps on Gameday Audio button

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the Audio EPG
Then the user will be able to launch any Gameday audio feed that is available, regardless of the team playing
Then the user will be taken to the Audio EPG
Then the user will be able to launch any Gameday audio feed that is available, regardless of the team playing

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV Away Feed
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps on game with Team A as away team
and taps on the away feed

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will start
Then the feed will start

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV Home Feed
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps on game with Team A as home team
and taps on the home feed

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed begins to play
Then the feed begins to play

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV OOTSB Switch Feeds
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and is viewing the Team A feed
and taps on a game from the top out of town Scoreboard overlay
for the other feed or a feed for another game

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not be able to access the stream
Then the user will not be able to access the stream

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - MLB.TV Button in Stream
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with single team account (Team A)
and is viewing stream for Team A
and taps on the MLB.TV button on top overlay
and taps to access the other team's TV feed

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will not play
Then the feed will not play

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Gameday Highlights tab
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with single team entitled account (Team A)
and the user is in Gameday
and is on the Videos tab
and taps on the feed for Team A

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed starts
Then the feed starts

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Local (In-market) Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitlement (Team A)
and taps on a local blackout feed for Team A

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play 

Verify local blackout copy on message - this if configurable

Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play

Verify local blackout copy on message - this if configurable

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - National Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitlement (Team A)
and the user taps on a National broadcast feed

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play

Verify national blackout copy on message - this if configurable

Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play

Verify national blackout copy on message - this if configurable

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Single team feed available, not selected
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on MLB.TV button
and views Team A @ Team B game
and taps on the Team B feed

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user sees a configurable message specific to this situation
and a "Watch Now" button(s) switch you to the available feed(s)

Then the user sees a configurable message specific to this situation
and a "Watch Now" button(s) switch you to the available feed(s)

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Game of the Day feed
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with single team entitled account (Team A)
and Team A has a Game of the Day stream
and the user taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps on the feed for Team A

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have access to the Team A feed
and the feed will begin to play

Then the user will have access to the Team A feed
and the feed will begin to play

title: MLB.TV Single Team Package - Archive feed for subscribed team
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps back to access an archive feed for Team A

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to access the archive feed
Then the user is able to access the archive feed
